name: fcm-push-handler
description: AWS Lambda function for FCM push notifications

scripts.sam:build: npm run build && npm run prepare-build && sam build
scripts.sam:deploy:prod: FIREBASE_B64=$(cat firebase-admin.json | base64 | tr -d '\n') && API_KEY=${LAMBDA_API_KEY:-$(openssl rand -hex 32)} && echo "Generated API Key: $API_KEY" && sam deploy --parameter-overrides "FirebaseServiceAccount=$FIREBASE_B64" "LambdaApiKey=$API_KEY"
scripts.sam:deploy:with-key: FIREBASE_B64=$(cat firebase-admin.json | base64 | tr -d '\n') && sam deploy --parameter-overrides "FirebaseServiceAccount=$FIREBASE_B64" "LambdaApiKey=$LAMBDA_API_KEY"
